price: Wala msichanganye kweli na uwongo na mkaificha kweli nanyi mnajua.
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Wala msichanganye Haki iliyo toka kwangu na upotovu mlio uzua nyinyi, hata ikawa halijuulikani la kweli na la uwongo. Wala msiifiche Haki, na katika hiyo Haki ni kumsadiki Muhammad, na nyinyi mnajua kuwa yeye ni wa kweli na wa kusadikiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
